title: Rishi Sunak – 2023 Statement at AUKUS Trilateral Press Conference
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Rishi Sunak, the Prime Minister, in San Diego on 13 March 2023.
content:
Sixty years ago, here in San Diego, President Kennedy spoke of: “A higher purpose – the maintenance of freedom, peace and…security”.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
